ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrike: Quickstrike glared a little harshly at Dark Mouse. He didn t like the sound of this, but he had a feeling that Black Arachnia could handle this.

Quickstrike:



Quickstrike glared a little harshly at Dark Mouse. He didn't like the 
sound of this, but he had a feeling that Black Arachnia could handle 
this. He knew how treachrous she was. 

"Listen," he said to her. "She's mah mate an' leader. Ah know she 
ain't on their side. Most certainly not on Hell Beast. He was gonna 
kill 'er. She's gonna do somethin', ah got uh feelin'. Ah jus' need 
t' find out. Ah's been kept outta this fer some reason, but ah'm 
gonna get inta it. Ah was busy back at base wit' Rattrap. Black 
Arachnia ain't no traitor t' us. Ah know she ain't. But if somethin' 
goes wrong, an' ya think somethin's gonna happen, ya can jus' leave. 
Ya don't have t' stick by me if somethin' gonna blow by yer head, 
hear? Ah'll stay 'til ah get uh gun t' mah head, that's th' way ah 
am. Ah'm used t' it. Ah'm second in command, ah gotta stick by Black 
Arachnia. But ah can still save mah own tail. Ah jus' trust her a 
lot. Ya don't understand how much ah missed her. An' ya don't have 
t'. Ah jus' need t' get back wit' her and find out what's th' plan."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> "No. Black Aracnia is in good with Hell Beast and Megatron. I've 
seen 
> them. They walk together now all the time. They have plans. Their 
> going to change the old base to a moving underwater base."
> She smiled. "Well, nowing a lot about computers and ease dropping 
> does help once in a while. But you can't trust Aracnia. She'll tell 
> Megatron everything." she had a worried look on her face. She felt 
> that something wasn't right with Quickstike. She knew he liked her, 
> but how much, she couldn't say. She didn't want to hurt him by 
> telling him this, but he had to know. "Look, Aracnia and Megatron 
are 
> working side by side. I can't take the chance and trust her now. I 
> got left behind once, and was counted for as dead. I didn't return 
> because I'm sure she would have thought me a traitor or something. 
> I'm no traitor, but I got to do what I can to stay alive.  your the 
> only one I trust. I don't trust Megatron, Aracnia, Hell Beast, or 
> KitKat. It's just you and me. I know KitKat's a good leader and 
all, 
> but she listens to her spark and not her head. She's bound to get 
> killed. When that happens, I'm toast. So, what do you say, we stick 
> together on this?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Quickstrike:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Quickstrike grinned at Dark Mouse. "Sure thing. Maybe we oughta 
> talk 
> > t' Black Arachnia. Or jus' me if ya want." He wondered if telling 
> her 
> > that Black Arachnia was pregnant was a good idea or not. She was 
> > after all a trusted friend.
